Detailed Description

Implementation class of surgical laparoscopic scissors.

This class, that inherits from vtkToolLaparascopy, defines surgical scissors, inside the scenario.
Contains methods for position control of the tool in the scene and collision detection.
Laparoscopic scissors are composed of 3 elements:

  • Stick
  • 2 Blades.

void vtkToolScissors::Close ( )

Close the grasper moving piece actors.

Piece actors are transformed to perform tool closing Bounding boxes are recalculated.

void vtkToolScissors::SetOpening ( double  opening)

Set the tool's opening according with the value given in the "Opening" parameter.

This function set the tool's opening in function of the value given in the "Opening" parameter. The opening is established modifying the tool's mesh position.
